summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the railroad franchises along the Seattle Waterfront District, amending Ordinances No. 9117 as amended by Ordinances 12191 and 92565; 9118 as amended by Ordinance 12018, 72613 and 92570; and 9119 as amended by Ordinances 66225 and 92569; to amend the description of certain railroad rights-of-way to reflect the termination by Burlington Northern Railroad Company of railroad operations along the waterfront by January 4, 1989.
